paragraph: But he says not all Saudis are the same."Some people use their hair to express themselves; I use Twitter."Another Trump-like flair: Musk also criticizes "social justice warriors."Musk talks about his "excruciating" 2018, fighting with journalists on Twitter, why Tesla won’t build an electric scooter and much more.Earlier this year, Musk was working 120-hour weeks to ramp up production of Tesla’s Model 3. Now he’s back to a "manageable" 80-90.A Verge affiliate site
